resources.string: This is a Demo long String that allows to check how the layout manages to handle long strings so don\'t worry about it not making sense. Unless this is the final version! That would be a problem.
Fer De Cavall album cover. Clicking it should lead to the songs.

One of many buttons to reach social platforms.
Hit here to start the song!
